metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15135 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: It was found that 389-ds-base since 1.3.6.1 up to and including 1.4.0.3 didnot always handle internal hash comparison operations correctly during theauthentication process. A remote, unauthenticated attacker couldpotentially use this flaw to bypass the authentication process under veryrare and specific circumstances.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
